item.description:
Report X-2024030322

  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was recovered from the 1-3-5 Unload and placed in a lined tote. DescribePack: One of the four bottles of muriatic acid developed splitting at the base of its container allowing it to spill partial contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Ther package was placed in the Hazmat cage on the Corrosive Pallet.
